p: Often animals require higher concentration of an experimental antiviral as compared to effective in vitro concentrations. Moreover, it is relatively difficult to achieve micromolar EC50 in vivo. For example, aminoglycoside antibiotics, kasugamycin and neomycin were successfully tested against ZIKV, FLUAV, and HSV-2 infections in mice ( Gopinath et al., 2018). Polyether antibiotic salinomycin also showed anti-FLUAV effect in mice ( Jang et al., 2018). In addition, investigational anticancer agent, flavopiridol, was effective against FLUAV in mice ( Soderholm et al., 2016). These findings support further development of these and other BSAAs.
